meanings.definition: To begin or start something outside or beyond a particular point or boundary.
meanings.sent1: She decided to outstarting her journey from the park instead of the usual starting point.
meanings.sent2: The team always outstarting their race from the edge of the field.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outstarting its nut collection from the neighbor's yard was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: His outstarting of the project from a different angle led to a unique outcome.
meanings.sent5: Outstarting the day with a smile can set a positive tone for the rest of the day.

meanings.definition: The act of starting or beginning something outside or beyond a particular point or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The outstarting of the marathon from a new location brought excitement to the participants.
meanings.sent2: Her outstarting of the painting from the corner gave it a different perspective.
meanings.sent3: The outstarting of the play in the middle of the audience surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The outstarting of the meeting with a joke lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: His outstarting of the song with a powerful note captured everyone's attention.
